not_voted.title: Vote for Amelie auf Top.gg
not_voted.description:
Some commands of Amelie can only be used if you vote for Amelie.
There is a lot of work in Amelie, support us with your vote :)

embeds.title: Amelie is currently globally deactivated
embeds.description:
Amelie is currently in the final stages of development, currently working on making APIs, the language system and caching fully functional.

Also, requests are currently being made for some privileged gateway intents to make Amelie fully functional. It takes time, but we will be there soon <3

embeds.title: <:newerror:926976473456320512> Permission not found
embeds.description: > The permissions `{perms}` was not found

embeds.title: List of permissions
embeds.description:
> These permissions can be assigned to a desired role, anyone with the role will then have rights to the selected functions.

> If you want to add a manager that has rights to all functions, write: 
> `a!perms add manager <role>`

> If you want to know which role has which permissions, just make 
> `a!perms list <permission>` to see all roles that have permissions to the specific permission

**All permissions**
> `announce`, `ban`, `unban`, `kick`, `config`, `customcommands`, `joinroles`, `logging`, `permissions`, `purge`, `reactionroles`, `webhook`, `welcomemessage`, `say`

embeds.title: ðŸ§­ Overview
embeds.description:
My Name is Amelie
If you need help with functions, use `a!help <command>`

âœ¨ **Management**
> `a!announce`, `a!customcmd`, `a!joinroles`, `a!reactionroles`, `a!webhook`, `a!welcomemsg`, `a!ban`, `a!unban`, `a!kick`, `a!config`, `a!purge`, `a!permissions`, `a!log`, `a!botinfo`, `a!disable`, `a!enable`, `a!guildinfo`, `a!language` & `a!userinfo`  

ðŸŽ‰ **Fun & Games**
> `a!slap`, `a!happy`, `a!cats`, `a!dogs`, `a!chameleon`, `a!meme`, `a!wallpaper`, `a!cry`, `a!kiss`, `a!hug`, `a!gm`, `a!gn`, `a!say`, `a!avatar`, `a!dance`, `a!food`  & `a!tictactoe`

<:gold:959720161903009803> **Lyra Game** (global game)
> `a!lyra`, `a!collect`, `a!inventory`, `a!use`, `a!sell`

ðŸŽŠ **Others**
> `a!donates`, `a!help`, `a!invite`, `a!support`, `a!report`, `a!riko`

embeds.title: ðŸ§­ Overview | help for announce
embeds.description:
**Usage**
How do I send an embed message?:
> `a!announce embed <#channel> [arg=""] [arg2=""]... <message>`
> **Args:** `title=""`, `color=""`, `image=""`, `thumbnail=""` & `footer=""`

How do I send a normal message?
> `a!announce normal <#channel> <message>`

**Information**
> With this feature you can send messages and embeds to custom channels
> **Aliases:** `a!sendmessage`, `a!send`, `a!message`

If you need further help, you are welcome to join our [support server](https://ameliebot.com/dc/)

footer.text: I am Amelie, I am here for you <3

embeds.title: ðŸ§­ Overview | help for custom commands
embeds.description:
**Usage**
How do I create a command?:
> `a!ccmd add <command> <message>`

How do I delete a command?:
> `a!ccmd remove <command>`

How do I list all my commands?:
> `a!ccmd list`

**Information**
> With this function you can create custom commands.
> **Aliases:** `a!ccmd` & `a!customcommand`

If you need further help, you are welcome to join our [support server](https://ameliebot.com/dc/)

footer.text: I am Amelie, I am here for you <3

embeds.title: ðŸ§­ Overview | help for joinroles
embeds.description:
**Usage**
How do I add a role?:
> `a!jr add <@role>`

How do I remove a role?:
> `a!jr remove <@role>`

How do I list all my roles?:
> `a!jr list`

**Information**
> With this function, you can add roles that will be automatically assigned to new users on your server
> **Aliases:** `a!roles` & `a!jr`

If you need further help, you are welcome to join our [support server](https://ameliebot.com/dc/)

footer.text: I am Amelie, I am here for you <3

embeds.title: ðŸ§­ Overview | help for reactionroles
embeds.description:
**Usage**
How do I add a reaction?:
> `a!rr add <#channel> <messageId> <@role> <emoji>`

How do I remove a reaction?:
> `a!rr remove <reactionId>` - use `a!rr list` to get the <reactionId>

How do I list all my reactions?:
> `a!rr list`

**Information**
> With this function you can create reaction roles, respond to them and receive a role
> **Aliases:** `a!rr`

If you need further help, you are welcome to join our [support server](https://ameliebot.com/dc/)

footer.text: I am Amelie, I am here for you <3

embeds.title: ðŸ§­ Overview | help for webhook
embeds.description:
**Usage**
How do I create a YouTube webhook?:
> `a!webhook add youtube <#channel> <CHANNEL ID>`
> The channel ID looks like this: `UC6Gc4KQ1ueDnh8x7plaAD3w`

How do I remove a YouTube webhook?:
> `a!webhook remove youtube <#channel> <CHANNEL ID>`

How do I list all my webhooks?:
> `a!webhook list`

**Information**
> With this function, you can create YouTube webhooks, so you will be notified as soon as a new video appears on the specified youtube channel.
> **Aliases:** `a!hook` & `a!wb`

If you need further help, you are welcome to join our [support server](https://ameliebot.com/dc/)

footer.text: I am Amelie, I am here for you <3

embeds.title: ðŸ§­ Overview | help for welcome message
embeds.description:
**Usage**
How do I create a welcome message?:
> `a!welcmsg add <message>`

How do I delete a welcome message?:
> `a!welcmsg remove`

**Information**
> With this feature you can create welcome messages that users will receive via direct message when they join your server.
> **Aliases:** `a!hook` & `a!wb`

If you need further help, you are welcome to join our [support server](https://ameliebot.com/dc/)

footer.text: I am Amelie, I am here for you <3

embeds.title: ðŸ§­ Overview | help for ban, unban & kick
embeds.description:
**Usage**
How do I ban a user?:
> `a!ban <@member> [reason]`

How do I unban a user?:
> `a!unban <userId>`

How do I kick a user?:
> `a!kick <@member> [reason]`

**Information**
> With these functions, you can ban & kick users from your server easily and quickly

If you need further help, you are welcome to join our [support server](https://ameliebot.com/dc/)

footer.text: I am Amelie, I am here for you <3

embeds.title: ðŸ§­ Overview | help for permissions
embeds.description:
**Usage**
How do I assign permissions?:
> `a!perms add <permission> <@role>`

How do I remove permissions?:
> `a!perms remove <permission> <@role>`

How do I list all granted permissions?:
> `a!perms list`

**Information**
> With this function, you can grant user permissions to certain functions of Amelie _(roles with `ADMINISTRATOR` permissions always have access to Amelie)_

If you need further help, you are welcome to join our [support server](https://ameliebot.com/dc/)

footer.text: I am Amelie, I am here for you <3

embeds.title: ðŸ§­ Overview | help for logging
embeds.description:
**Usage**
How do I create logs?:
> `a!log set <#channel> <ALL|[log]>`

How do I remove logs?:
> `a!log remove <ALL|[log]>`

How do I list current logs?:
> `a!log list`

**Information**
> With this function you can log what is happening on your server.
> **Aliases:** `a!logging`

If you need further help, you are welcome to join our [support server](https://ameliebot.com/dc/)

footer.text: I am Amelie, I am here for you <3

embeds.title: ðŸ§­ Overview | help for disable & enable
embeds.description:
**Usage**
How do I disable a command?:
> `a!disable <command>`

How do I enable a command?:
> `a!enable <command>`

**Information**
> With this function, you can disable and enable commands from Amelie.

If you need further help, you are welcome to join our [support server](https://ameliebot.com/dc/)

footer.text: I am Amelie, I am here for you <3

embeds.title: ðŸ§­ Overview | help for language
embeds.description:
**Usage**
How do I change the language?:
> `a!language <lang>`

**Available languages:** `English`, `German`, `Japanese` & `Hungary`

**Information**
> With this function, you can change the language of Amelie.
> **Aliases:** `a!lang`

If you need further help, you are welcome to join our [support server](https://ameliebot.com/dc/)

footer.text: I am Amelie, I am here for you <3

embeds.title: ðŸ§­ Overview | help for report
embeds.description:
**Usage**
How do I report a bug or user?:
> `/report`

-> This function uses only the slash command prefix `(/)` !!

**Information**
> With this function, you can report a bug or spelling mistake

If you need further help, you are welcome to join our [support server](https://ameliebot.com/dc/)

footer.text: I am Amelie, I am here for you <3
